article_title: Readers speak out about debtor's death in Box Elder jail
article_text:
News that a man who died in the Box Elder County Jail was there for a civil violation, not a crime, generated feedback from Standard-Examiner readers this week.

[View the story "Debtor dies in jail: Readers react" on Storify]

Do you want to weigh in? Add your thoughts in the comments below.
